description:
Ubuntu 24.04.2 LTS is now available for download as the second point release to the long-term supported Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (Noble Numbat) operating system series with up-to-date components.

The post Ubuntu 24.04.2 LTS Is Now Available for Download Powered by Linux Kernel 6.11 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Ubuntu 24.04.2 LTS Is Now Available for Download Powered by Linux Kernel 6.11
